body_html:
I updated pytorch this afternoon. This error is wired.
__version__ = '0.1.12+0ba2043'

By the way, I am implementing a cffi with THC generic files and manually linked the torch libraries in cmake file. Is there a better way to do it?

__version__ = '0.1.12+0ba2043'
By the way, I am implementing a cffi with THC generic files and manually linked the torch libraries in cmake file.  Is there a better way to do it?
body:
I updated pytorch this afternoon. This error is wired.
`__version__ = '0.1.12+0ba2043'`

By the way, I am implementing a cffi with THC generic files and manually linked the torch libraries in [cmake file](https://github.com/zhanghang1989/PyTorch-Encoding-Layer/blob/master/encoding/cmake/FindTorch.cmake).  Is there a better way to do it?
